sentences.en: A friend betrays us; a parent abuses us; a spouse leaves us.
sentences.cn: 会有朋友的背叛, 会有父母的错怪, 会有配偶的弃离.

sentences.en: Christians have only one spouse. This is called monotony.
sentences.cn: 众基督徒只能有一位配偶. 这叫无聊.

sentences.en: Discuss with your spouse in private how you'll handle a given situation.
sentences.cn: 和你的配偶私下商谈一下你们将如何对付某一可能发生的局面.

sentences.en: Finally , join your Little fingers, and try Ring fingers ( representing your spouse ) .
sentences.cn: 那么, 请大家合上小母指, 再试着张开 无名指.

sentences.en: Her dwarfish spouse still smoked his cigar and drank his rum without heeding her.
sentences.cn: 她那矮老公还在吸他的雪茄,喝他的蔗酒,睬也不睬她.

sentences.en: Her father is an ultra - conservative who is still opposed to freedom to choose her spouse.
sentences.cn: 她爸是个老古董,现在还反对她自由恋爱.

sentences.en: Her spouse will come to see her on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 她的配偶星期天要来看她.

sentences.en: It is often helpful to have your spouse in the room when major news is expected.
sentences.cn: 等待重大消息时最好有配偶在场。

sentences.en: Like the spouse, they pushed the blame to others.
sentences.cn: 就象上面所说的那位先生, 他们把责任推给别人.

sentences.en: Maybe you assumed that your spouse didn't care enough to be punctual.
sentences.cn: 你可能认为你那一位守时观念不够.

sentences.en: Spouse and helpmate of Adam Kadmon : Heva , naked Eve.
sentences.cn: 始祖亚当的配偶兼伴侣, 赫娃, 赤身露体的夏娃.

sentences.en: Spouses were invited to the company picnic.
sentences.cn: 配偶受到邀请参加公司的野餐会。

sentences.en: There must be more to being a leader's spouse than this.
sentences.cn: 作为领导者的配偶,所要做的肯定不止这些.

sentences.en: What is the best way to keep your spouse happy in the marriage?
sentences.cn: 在婚姻中保持配偶幸福的最好方法是什么?

sentences.en: You and your spouse both have to sign this contract.
sentences.cn: 你和你的配偶都需要签这份合同.

sentences.en: You should not read the email intended for your spouse.
sentences.cn: 你不应该看寄给你配偶的电子邮件.
